# believe_teams (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_teams" "example_teams" {
  league = "Premier League"
  min_culture_score = 0
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `league` (String) Filter by league
Available values: "Premier League", "Championship", "League One", "League Two", "La Liga", "Serie A", "Bundesliga", "Ligue 1".
- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000
- `min_culture_score` (Number) Minimum culture score

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `annual_budget_gbp` (String) Annual budget in GBP
- `average_attendance` (Number) Average match attendance
- `contact_email` (String) Team contact email
- `culture_score` (Number) Team culture/morale score (0-100)
- `founded_year` (Number) Year the club was founded
- `id` (String) Unique identifier
- `is_active` (Boolean) Whether the team is currently active
- `league` (String) Current league
Available values: "Premier League", "Championship", "League One", "League Two", "La Liga", "Serie A", "Bundesliga", "Ligue 1".
- `name` (String) Team name
- `nickname` (String) Team nickname
- `primary_color` (String) Primary team color (hex)
- `rival_teams` (List of String) List of rival team IDs
- `secondary_color` (String) Secondary team color (hex)
- `stadium` (String) Home stadium name
- `stadium_location` (Attributes) Geographic coordinates for a location. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--stadium_location))
- `values` (Attributes) Team's core values (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--values))
- `website` (String) Official team website
- `win_percentage` (Number) Season win percentage

<a id="nestedatt--items--stadium_location"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.stadium_location`

Read-Only:

- `latitude` (Number) Latitude in degrees
- `longitude` (Number) Longitude in degrees


<a id="nestedatt--items--values"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.values`

Read-Only:

- `primary_value` (String) The team's primary guiding value
- `secondary_values` (List of String) Supporting values
- `team_motto` (String) Team's motivational motto
